Text: Human Resource ReferralJeff Congratulations on the work you have been doing at Enron It must be an exciting time for you and I enjoy watching the company grow under your direction On a different note my firm has continued to expand its business practices We have been working with companies like Shell Texaco CocaCola Dell Computer BristolMyers Squibb and others I would very much appreciate having the opportunity to meet with your head of human resources or anyone you feel appropriate to present our capabilities Any assistance you could provide in this area would certainly be appreciated Thanks again and look forward to staying in touch Gary R Barton Barton Associates Direct Main Cell

Congratulations I am pleased to see things have continued to go very well for you I would like to reestablish my connection with Enron I was wondering if you might be able to introduce me to Billy Lemmons or Cindy Olson I look forward to staying in touch and thanks for your help Gary Barton Direct Main Email
